role.argrole: utilized for what? purpose (usually marked by من)

example.parse: (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I ترى) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM وزارة) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN المال))) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (PP-PRD (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الامكان))) (S-NOM-SBJ (VP (NOUN.VN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM افادة) (NP-SBJ (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_ACCGEN المصروفين)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الخدمة))) (PP (PREP ل) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN بلوغ) (NP-SBJ (POSS_PRON_3MP هم)) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC السن) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC القانونية)))))) (PP-CLR (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN خدمات) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN وزارة) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الصحة) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN العامة))

arg.g: those whom have been Dismissed from the service because reached the legal age

example.arg: المصروفين من الخدمة لبلوغهم السن القانونية

arg.g: from the services and the Ministry of Public Health
